server.title: Zotero API Server URL
server.description: The URL to the Zotero API. It usually should remain as-is unless you need to use a proxy or a custom server.

key.title: Zotero API key
key.description: Required: Zotero API key that you need to generate after logging in on www.zotero.org. It looks like this: P9NiFoyLeZu2bZNvvuQPDWsd
